ApplicationSubmissionInfoGrp.FormAndInfoAndMaterialsTxt: THE APPLICATION CAN BE FOUND AT WWW.TWUA.ORG.
ApplicationSubmissionInfoGrp.SubmissionDeadlinesTxt: THE APPLICATION MUST BE SUBMITTED BY JULY 1.
ApplicationSubmissionInfoGrp.RestrictionsOnAwardsTxt: APPLICANTS MUST BE A MEMBER OR A DEPENDENT OF A MEMBER OF THE TEXAS WATER UTILITIES ASSOCIATION AND PURSUING A COURSE OF STUDY IN THE WATER UTILITIES INDUSTRY.

ContributorBusinessName.BusinessNameLine1Txt: NORTH CENTRAL TEXAS REGIONAL OF TWUA
